title: Best Smartphones Under ₹20,000 in India (2025) — Value Picks
body: In 2025, the sub-₹20k segment offers 5G, 120Hz displays, and big batteries. Prefer 6GB/128GB, 5000mAh with fast charging, and recent Dimensity or Snapdragon chips. Prices change during sales—always verify the final price on the retailer page.

title: Top 10 Laptops for Developers (2025) — Coding, Docker, Battery
body: Look for recent Intel Core Ultra/AMD Ryzen 7+, 16GB+ RAM (32GB for heavy Docker), fast NVMe SSD, and a 14–16” display. Mind thermals and keyboard quality.

title: Best Smart TVs in India (2025) — Picture Quality vs Price
body: OLED for perfect blacks, QLED for bright rooms, IPS/VA for budget. 120Hz helps for sports/gaming. Prefer Google TV/Fire TV for apps.

title: Headphones Comparison Guide (2025) — ANC vs Battery vs Comfort
body: Balance ANC quality, comfort (lighter clamp), and codecs (AAC/aptX/LDAC). Try a fit test if possible and check return policies.

title: Best Gaming Phones for PUBG/BGMI (2025) — FPS, Thermals, Triggers
body: Prioritize sustained performance: Snapdragon 8-series or similar, vapor chamber cooling, 120/144Hz screens, shoulder triggers, and stable Wi-Fi 6/5G.

title: iPhone vs Samsung Galaxy Flagship (2025) — Which One to Pick?
body: iPhone: longer updates, strong video, tight ecosystem. Galaxy: faster charging, more customization, versatile cameras. Try both to decide UI and hand feel.

title: Best Budget Smartwatches (2025) — Health Features Under ₹5,000
body: Prefer AMOLED, accurate HR/SpO2, 5ATM if you swim. Battery 5–10 days with notifications. Check app quality and data export.

title: Air Conditioner Buying Guide (2025) — Inverter vs Non-Inverter
body: Match tonnage to room size; 4/5-star inverter ACs cut bills; PM2.5 filters help in cities. Professional installation matters.

title: Power Banks Comparison (2025) — Capacity, Ports, Safety
body: 10,000–20,000 mAh covers daily travel. Look for PD/QC support and safety protections. Check airline rules for high capacity.

title: Smart Home Gadgets You Must Have (2025) — Starter Kit
body: Start with smart plugs, bulbs, and cameras. Keep devices on 2.4GHz if your router splits bands. Use routines for energy savings.
